91:10.tafsir: and he will indeed have failed who eclipses it.He said:The soul which is misled by God, Mighty and Majestic is He, such that it does not give the matter of its final return any consideration, will fail.His words, Exalted is He:

91:3.tafsir: By the day when it reveals her [the sun],He said:This means: the light of faith removes the darkness of ignorance and extinguishes the flames of the Fire.

His words, Exalted is He:

91:9.tafsir: successful indeed will be the one who purifies it, He said:He who is granted [the ability to consider] (naẓar) the matter of his final return (maʿād), succeeds.
